Plot: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.
Title: Flightplan
Actors: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean, Kate Beahan
tomatoConsensus: The actors are all on key here, but as the movie progress, tension deflates as the far-fetched plot kicks in.
Language: German, Arabic, Japanese, English, Italian, French
